channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A Journey Into the Heart of Labubu
item.description: I made an epic trek across four countries to answer one question: Why is the world going mad for a plushie monster?

item.title: Gear for Good: 20 Eco-Friendly Items That Score a Win for the Planet—and for You
item.description: This gear for your home, your office, and the great outdoors treads gently on the planet without sacrificing design, comfort, or usability.

item.title: Epic Games says Apple’s new install process cuts user drop-offs by 60%
item.description: Fortnite maker Epic Games said that Apple’s new installation workflow, implemented in iOS 18.6, has had a positive impact on its user growth, with a 6...

item.title: U.S. government takes stake in Canadian lithium miner and its Nevada mining project
item.description: The U.S. Department of Energy has taken equity stakes in Canadian company Lithium Americas and its Nevada mining joint venture with General Motors as ...

item.title: Amazon’s Fire Tablets, Tested, So You Don’t Have To (2025)
item.description: Whether you need a travel-friendly slate or something affordable for the kids, we tested every model to find the right one for every occasion.

item.title: New project makes Wikipedia data more accessible to AI
item.description: A new database will make Wikipedia's wealth of knowledge more accessible to AI models.

item.title: Peloton Is Having Its Biggest Hardware Launch in Years
item.description: The company upgrades its entire hardware line and launches a new AI-powered cross training service.

item.title: The EPA Is Ending Greenhouse Gas Data Collection. Who Will Step Up to Fill the Gap?
item.description: With the agency no longer collecting emissions data from polluting companies, attention is turning to whether climate NGOs have the tools—and legal ri...

item.title: Toyota adds another $1.5B to its bet on startups at every stage
item.description: Toyota made two announcements that reflect the automaker's growing interest in startups working on mobility, climate, AI, sustainability, and industri...

item.title: Starbase hires Cameron County to police its streets and jail its offenders
item.description: Starbase is in the business of launching rockets, not policing, according to two new agreements.
